Package api.gbuild

This package provides basic data types and global constants and variables used during the construction of a gBuild component.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GColor
    Data type which stores a RGB color Processing language environment has utilities which can be used to define colors using RGB or HSV format.
    Globals
    Public constants and variables for gBuild components gBuild includes lots of default values for the attributes of UI components, as well as variables that are necessary to implements events on Processing.

Package api.gbuild Description

This package provides basic data types and global constants and variables used during the construction of a gBuild component.

On the one hand, the data types contained on this package are not truly useful for Processing developers, since the language environment already has them. The reason of its implementation is because they're used internally to build components. In other words, it is recommended to do not use them in Processing sketches, but they shall be used on the implementation of gBuild library.

On the other hand, public constants and variables are another case on which Processing developers might not want to use them on its sketches, but they're definietly recommended for gBuild implementation. However, some variables could be useful to manage components at a Processing sketch, such as the variables related to dialogs.

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
2.0.1
